metadata.title: CVE-2021-3743 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: [out-of-bound read bug in qrtr_endpoint_post in net/qrtr/qrtr.c] It was discovered that the Qualcomm IPC Router protocol implementation in the Linux kernel did not properly validate metadata in some situations. A local attacker could use this to cause a denial of service (system crash) or expose sensitive information.
